channel.title: RPG Genres 2021: Week 30: Cyberpunk
channel.description:
*Each Monday on our Twitter I post a question about the best rpgs in a particular genre. I thought I'd start cross-posting those here.*
So what's the best cyberpunk rpg out there? Do some emphasize cyber or punk exclusively? Which have the style and substance to make you want to bring them to the table?
For reference check out this series: https://ageofravens.blogspot.com/2017/10/history-of-cyberpunk-rpgs-part-six-2012.html
